snippet.title: ADORE - Launch Trailer | Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and Steam
snippet.description:
ADORE is available now for Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and Steam!

Explore the world of Gaterdrik, collect creatures, and assemble your team with a innovative gameplay!

ADORE, the first Brazilian real-time monster taming game to arrive on consoles.

Learn more: https://www.qubyteinteractive.com/games/Adore/

___________________________________________________________________

About QUByte Interactive:

QUByte is the largest independent publisher in Latin America for consoles and has its own in-house development studio, which is currently working on MARS 2120. QUByte's goal is to develop the local industry through partnerships in porting, publishing, and game development.

About Cadabra Games:

Award-winning Brazilian game developer focused on creating experiences that prioritize gameplay as the main pillar, enchanting casual players and challenging those in search of a thrill.
"Magic where it matters the most. In the vein of our games"

All rights reserved © 2023 QUByte Interactive.
